website_summaries.verdict: An ultra-wide screen for ultra-serious gamers.
pros: Enjoy serious immersion with this extended, super-fast IPS monitor
Features include a 75-hertz refresh rate, a 1-millisecond Motion Blur Reduction setting, and AMD FreeSync
In addition, this 1080p model has LG’s Dynamic Action Sync, which is designed to reduce input lag for quick in-game reflexes
cons: This monitor does not support 1440p and 4K resolutions

website_summaries.verdict: A great ultra-wide monitor that's ideal for gaming and multitasking.
pros: Features a height-adjustable stand, motion blur reduction, and FreeSync that reduces lag between a graphic card frame rate and monitor's refresh rate
Can screen split and includes multiple gamer modes
cons: Pricier than other monitors of the same size

customer_reviews.title: Great Price. Great Gaming Monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and for a great price. Been shopping monitors for my gaming setup for a few months now. Decided on ultrawide. Did my research. Found this one at a perfect price and the Square Trade warranty was well priced compared to retailers. Setup is easy. Settings easy to navigate. Awesome picture, and great, GREAT FOR GAMING.
customer_reviews.author: Ber

customer_reviews.title: Do you really need 1440p ?
customer_reviews.text: If your a Devoeloper, a high end gamer or a millionaire, than you can justify the expense or desire for a monitor that gives you 50% more resolution. If your like the over 90% of us who are not than this is a great value. I game world of warships, cruze the net, view youtube, oh yes and occasionally do some work. This LG is a quality for the slightly more than $250 you'll invest.. A lot of rel estate metal bezel and back, great stable stand thats fully ajustabled up and down and pitch. This is my second 69. I Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Marland

customer_reviews.title: Final Fantasy XIV compatibility - Good Graphics / Bad Sound.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor looks great at max graphics, but the speakers are unfriendly *UNLESS* you have the volume up loud. If you have the speakers at low or even medium volume it will fluctuate between quiet and loud constantly. It really makes the game sound horrible. They don't sound blown, it appears to be an issue with the technology. I have played music and watched netflix and movies and the sound is good, but when it comes to this game, it just can't handle it. Please take this into consideration if you play FFXIV. Good graphics, bad sound. If you use headphones to game, then it isn't an issue that should concern you.
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: Great budget monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Now that i have had the product replaced, it works great. 4/5 only because the first product was defective and LG support SUCKED, Amazons support was much more helpful. Old review: Two lines of pixels, one vertical other horizontal, went weird. It's not my gpu or my display port cable, they still show up on the monitor when i have it fully disconnected. No magnets or anything anywhere near the monitor since I've had it (under a week). I've tried all the tricks so I'm pretty sure its a hardware issue on the monitors end.
customer_reviews.author: Polar bears

customer_reviews.title: Stellar Monitor for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this during an Amazon Deal of the Day and benefited from the discount. Really great monitor for the price, might consider snagging another one. I bought this to replace my current 'work from home' monitor. Love the ultra-wide. Don't let the 1080p discourage you; depending on the type of work you do, you might not even require a higher res. The 1080p is perfect on my eyes. I did hook up the Xbox One to test some PUBG and had no issues. I'd say if you were looking for a gaming monitor, maybe research a 4K monitor to match the output of the 4K gaming consoles; but that's what my 4K TV is for in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: cant use all features from tv, not excellent for game or smooth screen.
customer_reviews.text: I was look forward get this to play game smoothly, i couldnt use any of features like blur freesync, 1ms motion blur reduction. so i am stuck with some lagging on tv from my device game even with usb c 40gb wire. my regular tv do very flawless with airplay with my device compare to this monitor with usb c. disappoint =(
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Nearly flawless
customer_reviews.text: Probably the second-best upgrade I've done, after the move from HDD to SSD, was buying this monitor. Games and media look incredible. The entire experience of using my computer has improved significantly. When you consider how much time you spend staring at your screen, it's worth investing in a good one. I just wish it had G-Sync to pair with my GTX 1060, but that's really more Nvidia's fault than LG's due to the proprietary licensing. The OnScreen software can also be kind of buggy, but exiting and starting it again clears it up.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be happier with this monitor. At under $300, you won’t find a better ultrawide. I would love for it to be curved, but I can’t ask for too much under $300. The quality is incredible with free sync and 1ms motion blur. It is 75hz but still a big improvement from 60hz. I tested a 32” curved 165hz gaming monitor but at 1080p it just wasn’t for me. With this monitor you get so much screen real estate and 75hz is still plenty imo even for an FPS. Noticing the price is at $350 now at the time of me writing this review but that’s still a good buy. If it drops any lower I’d say absolutely purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money and get a 3440x1440 resolution
customer_reviews.text: I have a newer macbook pro with USB-C connectivity. Was looking for a cheaper USB-C 34" Monitor, and purchased this as it was a great deal. Maybe I'm spoiled with the Retina display on my Macbook, but the resolution on this screen was worse than I thought. I returned the day after opening, spent an extra $150 to get a monitor with 3440x1440 resolution. Much better!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: LG Gaming Monitor Great for Business Use
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT monitor. I use it for business (not gaming). I replaced two 21.5-inch monitors with this one. The viewing landscape is wider and taller than the two monitors side-by-side that I replaced and doesn't have that gap in the center where the other two monitors abutted. It has taken a while to get used to sizing and moving open application windows around to my best advantage, but overall I really like this monitor. The brightness, contrast, etc. were perfect for me right out of the box so I've not needed to make any adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value and quality
customer_reviews.text: In love with this screen! It's actually too wide that I have to reduce the aspect ratio so that screen use actually fits within my field of view while I'm gaming. It tops out at 75 hz, but I don't think my eyes can really even tell the difference between that and 144 hz. I used to play on a TV monitor and the difference is night and day. I also use it for work and i can fit so many windows onto this super wide screen. The menu navigation with the single button at the bottom is amazing! So happy with this and at this price this is the best value monitor by a long shot.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was scared to get this at first, but it's actually amazing. It looks very nice and the quality is impressive, but what did you expect from LG. Buy this if you're in the market for an ultra-wide. It is 1080p, but honestly it looks awesome at 1080p. Unless you have the graphic horsepower to run 1440p or 4k, don't get those versions.
customer_reviews.author: Revving

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 2 weeks and it lives up to it's billing. For the price (I paid $287 on black Friday. Would have saved $50 if I'd waited until cyber Monday.) it is well worth it. Great picture, great stand. Very little light bleed at the corners when viewing full black.Playing COD WWII it looks great. I'm sure there is a more taxing game but I'm not a huge gamer. Love being able to put so much on the screen. It's not as wide as 2 HD monitors but it's pretty wide. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: James B. Wehrenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great for multiple screens
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly to upsize images for my aging eyes, but find the optional three screens in one monitor most useful for my writing work. I can have references on one screen, an outline on the second, and my writing on the third screen. No need for dual monitors. The drawback is when I upsize a website using the full monitor, it is necessary to scroll up and down. (I suppose that would be better than scrolling sideways.)
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Quit working shortly after warranty expired
customer_reviews.text: This monitor WAS great. Now it's not even 2 years old and no picture. The power button and backlight come on when something is connected, but it never presents a picture. I'm not sure how I failed to notice that it only had a 1 year warranty at purchase, but I should have known better than to purchase an LG.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  Fantastic Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. It has made everything I do on my PC soooo much better. Colors are super crisp and bright. I had to use a DisplayPort connection to get the full 2560x1080 resolution. When i tried using an HDMI connection it wouldn't recognize the top resolution and my attempts to custom set the resolution via windows led to less than desirable looking results. However, once i picked up a DisplayPort and plugged it in, all was right in the world. PC immediately recognized resolution and it looks gorgeous. Great monitor for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: wide and bright
customer_reviews.text: Wow, First of all i came from using 2 monitors 24 inch each and it was working fine. It was not very convenient as there were too many cables and monitors took too much space. This fits perfectly in my den cabinet as its not very high as normal 32 or 34 inch monitors. The width is so impressive and the bezel is so small that it impresses me everytime i work on it. Its perfect for running 2 application side by side whole day. 3 applications gets too much. i was afraid of this being just 1080p and not 4K but i dont see any pizels and everything looks crystal clear to me. Love this monitor everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Malik

customer_reviews.title: Creates a far more productive workspace
customer_reviews.text: Now that my wife is working from home, I set her up with a nice home office space. But she wanted multiple monitors. I had some extra 15" monitors lying around but they cluttered her desk. As a gift, I surprised her with this monitor, which allows her to have multiple windows open without shifting her eyes between three different non-contiguous screens. She's super-happy and, well, happy wife, happy life!
customer_reviews.author: Weave™

customer_reviews.title: Big screen  - works great with MS DOCS
customer_reviews.text: Got a great Price on the monitor. Refurbished is working great one month in, using it for work so screen can be split multiple ways. You have to install the LG software to control the screen. Some work PC's may not allow it installed since it is 3rd party software. Make sure if you are using a work PC the HD will download the LG software and install it on a work PC first!
customer_reviews.author: Sauce

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best monitor I've had
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 different monitors in my search to find the best one, who knew that the cheapest one of them all would be the best. This monitor was very easy to assemble, it's base is height adjustable and most importantly, the picture quality is INCREDIBLE! For the $275 I paid, it's a bargain of the year. I bought a 34" Ultra Wide 4k Curved monitor and returned in 10 minutes after setting it up because the picture quality was so junk compared to his LG monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Klim

customer_reviews.title: USB-C MacBook to Monitor Does NOT work (using USB-C / Thunder-Bolt 3 cable)
customer_reviews.text: USB-C port does NOT work!!! Use all correct USB-C ThunderBolt 3 cable, MacBook Pro, and this Monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Paul

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME MONITOR
customer_reviews.text: This is an EXCELLENT monitor. I bought it as a return for $190. Well worth every penny. Bright pictures and lots of real estate to see your editing and menus. I use this monitor as my edit, picture and timeline, and a second monitor for effects and menu items. Well worth the price and has been awesome. Great resolution, brightness, and picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: AZCAMERA REVIEWSTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Monitor is awesome for everything But!!!! The 1 control button
customer_reviews.text: When you need to use the button 1 button to do everything, Changing back in forth between computers is a real pain, it will not auto sense a change or something coming up. You have to manually change it Normally not a big deal but you have one button that u have to push up and sometimes it goes a bit to the side and your doing stuff you do not want to do, very fing annoying Video and all is great, if I had known about the manual and the button I would have bought something else
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Even after hours of tweaking the settings, and using various calibration methods, I realized that this monitor is crap. The blacks aren’t very black, text appears fuzzy, and I was generally underwhelmed. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dugger

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor but def not 5 star quality
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is fine and packaged perfectly the issue is don't bother using the built in speakers they are junk you almost hear a hum noise after certain things maybe because how low quality the speakers are not sure
customer_reviews.author: robert murphy

customer_reviews.title: Deceptively small screen size
customer_reviews.text: The real estate of the screen is much smaller then I expected. If you're a software developer like me, you'd be better off getting a traditional 32" 1080p screen rather than a 34" widescreen like this one. I can fit a lot more windows on a 32 inch screen with a decent resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Gohar

customer_reviews.title: Great-valued monitor, strongly recommend for budget ($200~500)
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ultra-wide monitor. I use my computer for gaming, intensive programming, web-searching and other various tasks. For all purposes, this monitor makes my life easier. The screen-split functionality works very well, except it does not officially support in Ubuntu or Linux. If you are working on Windows or Mac, you will have no problem using that functionality. The monitor looks very sharp, and I really like the design. So far, I've been using this monitor for about 3 months, and I haven't noticed a single issue. Again, this is a great-mid-valued (200~500) monitors, and if you are looking around a wide monitor in this budget range, this is your choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: A great investment and you will never regret!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product, no doubt about it! But one thing, pay attention! You must use higher-end graphics card. I’m using nVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB graphics card with 16GB of ram. Movie and picture quality are awesome! I have never seen this kind of quality in a monitor before. If you tweak the monitor with nVIDIA color setup, you will believe that you are watching a movie in a theater... Use Dolby surrounds too... I’m more than happy! Thank you LG!
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I set out on a mission to get a widescreen monitor that seemed to have the right specs....and usb-c for my MacBook. This has been a perfect monitor in terms of size for software development allowing me all the screen real estate I desired. Also, if you utilize a sit-stand desk this monitor allows you to easily adjust vertical height which I find extremely convenient. Not sure why you are still reading, go ahead and do yourself a favor by clicking that "Buy Now" button =)
customer_reviews.author: afreeland

customer_reviews.title: it's like out there
customer_reviews.text: Oh. My. God. Becky. Look at that monitor! It's...soo...big! I can't believe it's just so wide, it's like out there. Seriosuly, this thing is phenomenal! I'm running about 55-60fps off my 1060 in my predator laptop playing Witcher 3 in 21:9 beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor for editing and casual gaming.
customer_reviews.text: I love the monitor. The speakers are great saves me money on buying speakers (Im more of a surround sound heaphone guy). Its bright, great for editing videos and footages. I really like the adjustables height and tilt. Its 2019 so complaining about games not supporting 21:9 is a thing of the past. Im a casual gamer not a hardcore competitive gamer who needs 144hz or 240hz. So going from 60hz to 75hz still made a difference for me. Single player games looks great on this ultra widescreen. I only wished the screen took up the whole screen. Other than that if youre on a budget like me you cant really complain.
customer_reviews.author: Kima

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I use this monitor for everyday use as a student. it gets the job done for me. I have run a couple of games on it and it looks great, not amazing. I usually use SolidWorks on this screen and type papers and I think this screen is amazing for those applications. the button under the monitor is ok to navigate the menu screen, but who really has to go in there every day to adjust their setting, so its not that bad. I would recommend this screen for people that are going to school or people that want more screen real-estate. It's a great screen overall and I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Not a computer buff, but I was pleasantly surprised my PS4 Pro, and my XBOX 1 X both output to ultra wide! And it looks beautiful on Netflix or any movie, games look wonderful. 100% happy with my purchase. Only thing I wish is that they had multiple HDMI ports, but Its understandable.
customer_reviews.author: rosemary adams

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This was really a great value. I use this monitor for a combination of work and gaming. You can easily have two files open side by side which is nice for work. For gaming, I think it is pretty good, its not the top of the line monitor, but for most games its great. In my opinion if your looking for a better monitor for gaming you'd have to spend a lot more. Likely three or four times the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: An excellent monitor
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor to hook it up to my Alienware laptop, primarily for gaming. It has excellent picture quality. The sound is actually pretty good, but I have a pair of Creative Lab speakers hooked up to it. For the price, I could not have done bought a better quality monitor, especially this size. The colors are sharp and clear, and the driver interface is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Elitch264

customer_reviews.title: It was great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: My monitor just went dead today and I was trying to figure out the issue. It looks like it's completely dead panel although the power and sound is still working. Based on past reviews, it looks like the LG monitors built around Sept 2017 have had quality issue problems. I bought this monitor during the Cyber Monday sale on Nov 27, 2017. It was great while it lasted; I enjoyed the immersive gaming while it was still working. But now it's dead and I need to buy a new monitor in order to work efficiently in 2020. Sad that my HannsG monitor that is 10 years old lasted longer than this ultrawide.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Ma

customer_reviews.title: Annoying to use, colors are awful, buy something else
customer_reviews.text: The color gradients are awful. Don't plan on watching dark scenes, or play any games that involves shadows/color gradients. Gradients are blocky, down flow, and are really distracting. The build quality is OK, but the menus are annoying to navigate, and trying to turn the monitor off is a pain. Overall, I wouldn't recommend this monitor. Spend a little extra money on something a little nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Huge screen great for CAD
customer_reviews.text: I don't play games, but this screen is great for CAD and other computer programs as well. I use multiple desktops on my macs and this screen provides a huge working area. The format provides a great environment for CAD tool menus, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk

customer_reviews.title: Monitor sparingly used; failed after 18 months
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews cite the September 2017 manufacture date on this model as being a predictor of failure. Sure enough, mine (manufactured September 2017) failed after 18 months even though it was used sparingly. Colorful vertical lines now occupy 30% of the screen when turned on; rest of the screen is black. Really disappointing experience with our first LG purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CJtheDJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice big monitor even for a non-gamer.
customer_reviews.text: Nice big monitor. I use it for daily computer works with the split screen mode. It replaced two monitors and made the desktop neat and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffhdz

customer_reviews.title: It simply works
customer_reviews.text: I can't get HD. The error message says it is due to other components not being HD ready, so I'll have to work on that. Otherwise, the picture is great (not as good as my old apple, but still great.) Setup is easy, you just play with settings until you find what you like. I find the color rendition perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Fred L. Curry

customer_reviews.title: Solid for most daily activities
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2018. Really late on my review but monitor still works great! Mostly used it for gaming and Netflix but now I use it as my work from home second screen due to the virus. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to one-up a friends monitor that was fairly large.. I just needed something for him to be like “woah”, and it did the trick!! I would say it’s almost too big.. but come on, who actually says that!? I had to buy a larger desk to fit both of my other monitors.. but I would do it again. And would buy this again. Colors are great, and I like the ability to raise / lower the display on its stand.
customer_reviews.author: Alan C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: amazing looking and great picture quality, my only issue with this monitor is the small 2inch piece that connects the monitor to the stand its too narrow to support the ultrawide so the one I received dips on the left side about 2 to 3 inches so I had to prop the corner up with something, but for the price its still a great deal
customer_reviews.author: Zak P

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Works great sadly not all games use this resolution but you can change the ini file for most games that don't support it the only thing I wish is that it was flat black instead and no red accent on the stand but that is very minor the speakers are ok can't expect the world from a monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Mike poland

customer_reviews.title: Package only came with monitor and stand, no cables
customer_reviews.text: Initially, this part was shipped without the HDMI or the power supply. Amazon worked with me in order to get me these items without charging me anything else. So now I can it actually review this product since I am currently typing while using it. The display is beautiful and connection is ultrafast. I have had zero problems gaming or using my broker. The hardware associated with the product is also very nice. The vertical and tilt adjustments are very nice. I had a very easy time getting this monitor into the best possible position to use. All around a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Before I got this monitor, In was using it's little brother (the 29" version) and I must say, the extra size is a huge difference. This monitor has a lot of screen real estate and gets more than bright enough for what I will ever use it for. Colors are fairly accurate and the 1ms response time is nice for playing games. The ultrawide aspect ratio of 21:9 is honestly a game changer for both video games and for getting work done. I have had the monitor for a while now and I have found no issues or complaints to mention.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M

customer_reviews.title: Short life span even when used with care, will not replace, looking elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Just died after a year and a couple months. Very lightly used and will now cost more to fix than buying a new one. Don't buy this, it's too much of a gamble. Once the joystick button goes, it's not worth replacing, and they are as fragile as it comes. LG will not be getting my business in the future, what a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I have been using my monitor for a ew weeks now, using monitor for regular work I'm not a gamer. Monitor is great colors are sharp especially the blacks. I have a MacPro 2018 and is seamless with it. I would highly recommend to all. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Casero

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for heavy home office use
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my home office monitor so it gets a ton of use. It replaced my old 2-monitor setup and I find that i can have a chat window, email and a browser or working document open and still see all three clearly. I also use it for AutoCAD or Visio full-screen which makes even the most detailed technical documents easy to see, even at my age.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal @ $214 after tax 1-2 yrs ago. Works Great. Didn't come with DP cable which is annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Think its odd they include an hdmi but not a DP cable as most hdmi cables can only support 60hz which this monitor is supposed to be 75hz... maybe the hdmi cable they supplied supports it but I think it would make more sense to package a DP cable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm totally happy with the picture quality and features
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year and it's still working well. I'm totally happy with the picture quality and features. I love ultra wides. If you're ok with 1080p gaming, then you'll be fine with this monitor. I work from home with this monitor too and find that text and everything adapts fine to the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle K.

customer_reviews.title: It is great for gaming and amazing to look at
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this monitor, it was on sale for $230. It is great for gaming and amazing to look at. When watching videos on YouTube, there are black bars on each side to adjust for the 21:9 ratio but its not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Ranjit

customer_reviews.title: Biggest disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Okay you open this most beautiful monitor ever looks so good plug it in and its instant did I mess this up or this really look this terrible 1080p does not belong on ultra wide spend extra money or save get 1440 worth it
customer_reviews.author: Caleb J.

customer_reviews.title: I will never go back to non-ultrawide.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this monitor instead of using 2 21.5” monitors. Wow, I love this 34” Ultrawide and I am never going back to a two screen setup. I am creating a secondary workstation and waiting for LG’s 25” ultrawide to be delivered. It won’t top the 34” but I’m still excited.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Having already had the 29" version of this monitor for about 2 years, I was already a big fan of the 21:9 format. This new 34" version takes it to the next level and is amazing. Will be purchasing a second one in the near future as well.
customer_reviews.author: san

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfactory!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the use intended! Not using for gaming... so do not know about that. But for coding, with several windows open and viewable, it is excellent! Everything working as advertised. Great color, surprisingly decent speakers.
customer_reviews.author: A. Struthers

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Not as large as I was thinking but great nonetheless. About the size of two 19 inch square monitors. Will be really difficult if I ever have to go back to two separate monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer_X

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute bargain. I LOVE being able to have multiple windows on this HUGE 34 inch widescreen monitor. It looks absolutely beautiful - the stand is fantastic - and it blends seamlessly into my office. Movies look amazing too - along with spreadsheets and web content! So glad I purchased this - buy it - you will not be disappointed. WOW.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this monitor at first. It is built well and colors look great. I'm having lag issues with it now. Only have had three months. Maybe a software issue. Also marketed as gaming but only 60 HZ
customer_reviews.author: Chevy Absher

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor and value
customer_reviews.text: I am not a computer geek or a profecional, this ultra wide monitor helps a lot doing my photo editing and video,resolution is great,crisp and clear, Ive play some normal games and that wide screen looks incredible
customer_reviews.author: jesus aguayo jr

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for work desk top using multiple windows opened. It is very clear and easy to enlarge documents and photos. Sorry we don’t use them for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: attymikeb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent monitor for the price. Assembly and installation was no straight forward presenting no problems. I currently have it installed with an HDMI KVM switch for use with two separate systems. This monitor is a wonderful addition to my home office space. I work with graphics and documents and the display is crisp and clear.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lisa Rose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price, but a bit delicate.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to say, given this is my first high-end (ish) monitor. I can definitely say this is worth the money. Impressive performance for the dollar. If you're looking for something better than your average monitor but you don't want to break the bank, this is an excellent option. Just be careful with the panel. After cleaning it I noticed a dead pixel. Please handle with care.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this monitor at all returned it
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture, HUGE
customer_reviews.text: This LG is exactly what I need to expand my desktop. I do a lot of multitasking with various Office programs + financial stuff and between this primary and my old 27" screen, my workload moves much faster and easier. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Never LG again!
customer_reviews.text: My monitor died last week, exact 4 months after the 1 year warranty expired. I called them and was instructed to do troubleshooting. Still no luck after all tricks. Then I was offered to pay $400 to replace/repair. I am so disappointed and rejected their deal. No more LG in my life. My advice: think twice before going for LG.
customer_reviews.author: Bill M

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I got this last week and I was very impressed at how smoothly it worked out of the box. I encountered no dead pixels. No additional software was necessary to install. Just plug and play. I had no issues getting any games running at 2k resolution. Picture quality is fantastic. This is well worth the price if you want a solid gaming monitor at ultrawide aspect ratio and 2k resolution. I hope I don't run into any issues down the line but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Metatron58

customer_reviews.title: Would reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Wish it could get brighter, have it hooked up to my laptop via displayport to mini displayport. Love that it has built in height adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: 3.5mm audio jack died within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: The 3.5mm audio jack just squeals no matter what device or what 3.5mm audio cable is used. Im pretty sure i have a defective unit.
customer_reviews.author: Dodecahedron

customer_reviews.title: Very good monitor for gaming!!
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the price tag. I love it! So I am using a gtx 1070 for this and the 75hz still works fine. Just can't take advantage of the freesync which is fine. Colors are great and the adjustable features are great. I highly recommend this monitor. Happy gaming! I don't notice any pixels. Or light bleeds. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and picture
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is excellent. I use it for photoshop and website development. It runs smoothly on my nvidia quadro 4000. The built in speakers are just a bonus because I didn’t even realize it came with them.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Got 2 of these monitors and neither of them work
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand if this is a quality issue with the product or a power issue as some forums indicate. The product just does not work with either of my Macs while another LG monitor does. Tried ordering a replacement and that has the same issue. Tried resetting the settings to factory default but the issue isn't resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Nitya Oberoi

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality, slightly slanted. Works with my old 2012 macbook pro. Just use a mini display port to display port cable and it will work if anyone is worried about that.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Great product for multiuse.
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my 27 in widescreen setup. Now I have dual monitors. With the LG On Screen Control, I can simulate 2+ monitors. With LG Dual Controller, I can share my laptop and my desktop on my 34 inch monitor. While watching movies, the screen is almost 4k. I have a GTX 1070 and the monitor is great. While gaming, the monitor is great.
customer_reviews.author: Raul rivera

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: no dead pixels, works great so far (2 weeks). The only complaint would be the 1 push button that works all 4 major functions (including power) using a 'joystick' type method. Push in and back for power.. Push in and to the right for something else... etc.. It's just annoying. The ultra-wide definitely feels like a luxury but some of the games I play don't fully support it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Legendary screen for the price
customer_reviews.text: I dig this, can't complain. Everyone compliments the size, and I have no problem using it for gaming. I totally would buy this for everyone at the office. :)
customer_reviews.author: budlight

customer_reviews.title: wowsers, this monitor was flawless until it kept turning ...
customer_reviews.text: wowsers, this monitor was flawless until it kept turning on/off by itselft. no people its not my pc i tried different monitor and hdmi cables and this is the only monitor that does that. Looked online and it might be the capacitors. LG warranty states you send in the monitor first, making you loose 3-6 weeks of time without the monitor, instead they should send a replacement and have you send the faulty one in, period. lol ooo LG.....never buying LG again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: My only dislike is the crappy speakers, which is why it got 4 stars. Other than that, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ver Linden

customer_reviews.title: Great but go for the curved screwn
customer_reviews.text: It takes a bit to crane your neck to take in the whole screen. I've used a curved one now. Would go with that next time
customer_reviews.author: Ryan W. Radtke

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.text: It works well, I like it. It's my first ultrawide and I was on a budget lol. Instead of waiting and saving, I just got this one. Ultimately I am happy with it. I am coming from a TV so this is a bad-ass gaming monitor. Everything works and it plays games nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Vance

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice monitor. The color is very good and i have not noticed and blur at all. It is very easy to hook up. It does take a bit to get used to from the smaller ones . I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A. Sides

customer_reviews.title: Clear picture, weak sound
customer_reviews.text: Takes the place to two side by side monitors. Very clearn picture. Speakers are minimal, however.
customer_reviews.author: Katiebean

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for gamers
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this monitor for about a month and all I can say is that it was worth every penny. I mainly game with my Xbox on it but do use the display port to connect my MacBook to it which works perfect. The 34” is the way to go for multitasking with all that space. They have a few different cross reticle options you can put that stays in the center of the screen which has helped me be a even better Fortnite player with quicker perfect accuracy as well as the quick response time the monitor has.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 1.5 years!
customer_reviews.text: Monitor died after 1.5 years of use, monitor was lightly used. Was great while it lasted, I would not recommend this monitor to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sun

customer_reviews.title: Great value; improved productivity
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly right out of the box. Didn’t need to run any software. Comes w HDMI cable, though it wasn’t listed in the description. I use it for work, not gaming. My only wish is that the volume was in sync w my Mac, not the two separate controls.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Halonen

customer_reviews.title: Very worthwhile purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Superb monitor. It is incredibly sharp and vivid. It's one of those things whereby you don't know what you were missing until you see it in action. Made me realize just how advanced the technology has come since I last purchased a monitor.
customer_reviews.author: T.Worth

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: Easy hook up to MacBook Pro. Good picture. Does not provide enough power to charge while using.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple set up. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I use it for video editing, and it works fine. Lots of real estate to edit in.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Love this Big Wide Monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Big Big Monitor. I use the Display port and the picture is great. Takes a little getting used to the shorter distance from top to bottom. I have to scroll down a little to see the whole page. I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: alphateefl

customer_reviews.title: Just what it says
customer_reviews.text: My best monitor in color and performance, and the extra real-estate is used well by most of my games, and looks sweet in Dirt2 and X-Plane 11! It's also really nice for software development.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Monitor but had a Defect just after 2 Days.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the monitor! It's big, stylish, and has lots of options to tinker with. However, literally just 2 days after I got the monitor, the monitor started making this popping noise from it's speaker. It was constant, and would not go away no matter what I did. I already sent a replacement request, but if I get this issue again then this review is gonna stay a 3 out of 5. I hope the new replacement will actually work perfectly unlike this one.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great Ultrawide Value!
customer_reviews.text: Badass ultrawide on a budget! Easily a great value for your money. Highly recommend if you want an untrawide experience without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Sean C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the price in comparison to other monitors that are for sale. Everything else seems way too expensive and not even worth it to pay an extra $300-$400 just because it's curved or is 4K. This one is perfect for split screen. Sound quality and screen quality are good too. I love the design of the monitor itself. Easy to set up. So far very happy and no issues. I would recommend this monitor to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Halisa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I use a sound and video editing product, excellent quality! Responds very quickly! The speakers are not of high quality. The function of the screen distribution software is very convenient. Value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Avihay Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great ultrawide for office.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my office. Perfect size split screen for old eyes. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Surncle

customer_reviews.title: Likely to fail
customer_reviews.text: Owned the monitor for 2 years, and like many others have experienced, it began to break down. Specifically the speakers stopped working and a line of stuck pixels appeared dead center on the screen. LG only warranties the product for 1 year and want's $400 to repair it. Disappointing quality. I would suggest you look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Berry

customer_reviews.title: Solid and large!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but the screen could be a little brighter. It's awesome for the price paid!
customer_reviews.author: andrew victory

customer_reviews.title: Dont do it
customer_reviews.text: After less than a year the screen was covered with lines Was shipped back to LG, they had it for over 1 month, without any notification they now say they cant fix it And refused to put a Supervisor on the phone
customer_reviews.author: T. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: This thing is huge lol
customer_reviews.text: For a guy who was using 2x 19" monitors until now... this was a huge step up and this thing is huge. The image is super clear and I love every part of it. Now I just need a AMD GPU so I can take full use of the AMD Freesync feature.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C.

product_meta.title: LG 34UM69G-B 34-Inch 21:9 UltraWide IPS Monitor with 1ms Motion Blur Reduction and FreeSync,Black
product_meta.description: The LG 34UM69 21:9 Ultra Wide monitor is 21:9 large screen monitor that's ready to play. The large real estate of the wide screen helps create an immersive viewing experience ideal for griming. With the 34 inch IPS display, your games (and all your on screen content) will seem to come to life. For gamers, high performance features like 1ms Motion Blur Reduction and AMD Free Sync provide smooth, responsive gaming while the Crosshair and Black Stabilizer features give gamers the advantage to optimize game play according to their game preferences. Features radeon freesync. Without stand is 32.6 wide x 14.6 high x 1.6 deep in inches. The screen is not currently set to the recommended resolution. If you have no video or the screen flickers, see the troubleshooting guide in the product user manual. Color Depth : 6bit+A FRC, 16.7M colors. Viewing Angle(CR≥10): 178/178.
feature_bullets: 34" Widescreen Full HD IPS Display. Resolution-2560x1080
HDMI :Yes (ver1.4), Display Port : Yes(1.2), USB-C : Yes (DP Alt. Mode)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars701 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
